What one issue mattered most to you in deciding how you voted for president? Open-ended1 Closed-ended2 The economy 35%     58%     The war in Iraq 5     10     Health care 4     8     Terrorism 6     8     Energy policy 0     6     Other 43     8     Total100     100

Source: Pew Research, November 2008 post-election survey.
content.question: Which of the following elements of polling likely created the difference in the poll results?

choices.label: The difference was likely a result of the margin of error.
One poll is a tracking poll, and the other is a benchmark poll.
The formats of the survey questions are different.

content.answer: The formats of the survey questions are different.
